entry.title: Virtual Open Studio
entry.content:
Use this as a space to meet up with friends that you might not get to see otherwise. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be there and is happy to help offer critique, technical advice, and general help.

Join through Zoom with the meeting ID of 225-329-141 or follow this link.
entry.summary: Use this as a space to meet up with friends that you might not get to see otherwise. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be there and is happy to help offer critique, technical advice, and general help.

entry.title: Open Studio
entry.content: General open studio hours. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee while it lasts.
